title: Trousers tucked into boots: how to wear autumn's trickiest trend
text:
Knee-high boots are a huge trend for autumn. You will know this by now - because really, they've been back for a good few winters. But there is one very 2019 way of wearing them that I'm finding to be a bit of an elephant in the room, in that the look is everywhere, but no one has really said much about it or offered guidance. Because it's a tricky one: the long boot with trousers tucked in.

I don't want to sound negative but there are so many ways for this to go wrong. You could end up going all 'principal boy in the Woking Christmas panto', or looking like you're en route to muck out the horses, or as if you're channelling a noughties WAG. Oh, but you could also emulate Brie Larson in this...
description: Knee-high boots are a huge trend for autumn.
